description:
Demonic cream-filled pastries turn Stocking into the widest of wide loads, and Panty plays naughty when Garter Belt’s lingerie run runs out of lingerie! Poor Brief may never recover.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Diet Syndrome / High School Nudical
ダイエット・シンドローム / ハイスクール・ヌーディカル
